name: df-disj
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wal(s1, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
comment: A collection of classes ` B ( x ) ` is disjoint when for each element ` y ` , it is in ` B ( x ) ` for at most one ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.) (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
